hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: pkgs
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: 若为空即为工程全量打tag，否则为单包或多包打tag。 请参照如下格式（备注：分隔符支持英文逗号，空格和换行）： package1，pacakge2 或者： package1 pacakge2 ...

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: tag_manage_type
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: tag处理方式：新增或者删除

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [[ -z $tag_manage_type ]];then exit 0 fi
sudo su - root <<EOF
echo "nameserver 114.114.114.114" >> /etc/resolv.conf
git config --global http.sslVerify false git config --global http.postBuffer 52428800 git config --global user.email "80474298@qq.com" git config --global user.name "openeuler-ci-bot" git config --global pull.ff only
touch ~/.oscrc cat > ~/.oscrc << FEOF [general] apiurl = http://117.78.1.88 [http://117.78.1.88] user = $OBS_USER pass = $OBS_PWD FEOF cat ~/.oscrc
cd $WORKSPACE
wget http://172.16.1.95:88/mkb/openeuler-obs/openeuler_obs-v1.4.5_test-aarch64.tar.gz tar -xvf openeuler_obs-v1.4.5_test-aarch64.tar.gz && cd openeuler_obs-v1.4.5_test-aarch64/tools
set -e if [ -z $pkgs ];then ./gitee_tag_manager -u ${GiteeCloneUserName} -p ${GiteeClonePassword} -proj ${project} -br ${branch} -tag_n ${tag_name} -tag_t ${tag_manage_type} else ./gitee_tag_manager -u ${GiteeCloneUserName} -p ${GiteeClonePassword} -proj ${project} -br ${branch} -tag_n ${tag_name} -tag_t ${tag_manage_type} -pkgs $pkgs fi
#wget http://172.16.1.95:88/mkb/openeuler-obs/test/gitee_tag_manager.py #if [ -z $pkgs ];then # python3 gitee_tag_manager.py -u ${GiteeCloneUserName} -p ${GiteeClonePassword} -proj ${project} -br ${branch} -tag_n ${tag_name} -tag_t ${tag_manage_type} #else # python3 gitee_tag_manager.py -u ${GiteeCloneUserName} -p ${GiteeClonePassword} -proj ${project} -br ${branch} -tag_n ${tag_name} -tag_t ${tag_manage_type} -pkgs $pkgs #fi
EOF
